channel.title: Winter Event with Mafia Colosseum! - Forum Event
channel.description:
![image|690x259](upload://b2liiQ0kog3yGkzzRR6ZCPJyw21.jpeg) # [color=e62020]**Happy Holidays!**[/color]
To celebrate another year of Throne of Lies, as well as the upcoming holidays, we've worked together with [**Mafia Colosseum**](https://www.mafiacolosseum.com/threads/welcome-to-the-winter-event.500) to create some fun games and activities for you all to enjoy. ## Forum Games * **@osieorb18's Micro League** - [**SIGNUPS**](https://www.mafiacolosseum.com/threads/the-cyberiad-mafia-micro-mini-league-signups-1-14.499/) *Trurl and Klapaucius are two genius robot constructors who travel around the universe aiding those in need. This 14-player anonymous mafia league is the story of the Seven (Nine) major Sallies into Space of Trurl and Klapaucius.* * Hosted on Mafia Colosseum * 14 players * Anonymous * Closed setups * Phases are 48/24 * Starts as soon as it fills! * **@DatBird's JoJo's Part 7 Forum Mafia - [SIGNUPS](https://www.mafiacolosseum.com/threads/jojos-bizarre-adventure-part-7-forum-mafia-signups-6-19.498/)** *A rolemadness game based on Part 7 of the fan favorite manga/anime JoJo's Bizarre Adventure* * Hosted on Mafia Colosseum * 19 players * Closed setup * Phases are 48/24 * Starts December 14th * **@Arete's JoatJoatJoat13** JoaTJoaTJoaT13 is an open set-up where every power role is a JoaT. Since it has 3 JoaTs, it's 1.5x better than JoaT^2. * Hosted on Forum of Lies * 13 players * Open setup * Phases are 48/24 * Starts December 21st ## Other Activities Don't have time for FM? Join us on our Event Discord to participate in other games and activities such as: * Live Mafia * Skribbl.io * Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes * Jackbox Party Packs * Blood on the Clocktower * Among Us * Wolfia * Simulwatch **Schedule updates and announcements can be found on the FoL/MC Crossover Discord Server! We hope to see you there!** https://discord.gg/W33GY7m3QX *Reminder: By playing on Mafia Colosseum, you agree to follow their [rules](https://www.mafiacolosseum.com/threads/forum-rules.9/#post-34). Breaking any rules during this event will lead to consequences on both sites.*

item.title: Winter Event with Mafia Colosseum! - Forum Event
item.dc:creator: Geyde
item.description:
Chloe:

@Arete’s Enter the JoaTrix

JoaTrix is a 13-player semi-open matrix set-up where all power roles are Jacks-of-all-Trades.

  • Hosted on Forum of Lies
  • 13 players
  • Semi-open setup
  • Phases are 48/24
  • Starts December 21st

Edit

Setup has been changed from a matrix to an open setup
Renamed: JoatJoatJoat13
Everything else remains the same
